  1. Home
  2. Pedrali Gliss 921 lounge armchair with sled base

Perhaps the two designers Marco Pocci & Claudio Dondoli would never have imaged such a big success for GLISS 921, a chair that became a proper collection of seats for Pedrali. They are destined to different spaces: from home ambiances to contract rooms. Surely, one of the reasons for its success is the soft embracing shape, together with its cool and young design. GLISS 921 is here presented in the polished chromed version with sled legs. The seat is made of acrylic with transparent, smoky, transparent red, orange and green or covering black finishes. Available on Shop Decor in covering black with sled base in steel.
